thread.title: Patrick Kennedy shares secret family struggles in "A Common Struggle"
thread.title_full: Patrick Kennedy shares secret family struggles in "A Common Struggle"

title: Patrick Kennedy shares secret family struggles in "A Common Struggle"
text: Patrick Kennedy shares secret family struggles in "A Common Struggle" October 5, 2015, 7:31 AM | Former Rhode Island Congressman Patrick Kennedy writes of his own mental illness and addictions, but he also looks at his parents' problems with alcohol and his mother's depression. Kennedy believes his father, Ted, suffered from post-traumatic stress after two of his brothers were assassinated. Kennedy joins "CBS This Morning" to discuss why he decided to reveal the Kennedy family secrets. Related Videos
